alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson County through 600 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black River Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black River Falls around 510 PM CDT. Millston around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include East Fork Campground, Sand Pillow, City Point, Melrose, Shamrock, The Black River Correctional Center, Pigeon Creek Campground, The Black River Falls Airport, Castle Mound and Potters Flowage. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 110 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
